content.body: should localstorage instances called on windows between iframes still work?

content.body: i found an interesting bit of js that works around a website deleting localStorage by creating an iframe and setting window.localStorage from iframe.contentWindow.localStorage

content.body: That seems reasonable, we generally don't inspect callstacks in web specs at least

content.body: yeah i just wasn't sure if it was some sort of like, branding thing that was broken. if it comes down to call stacks the behavior seems reasonable.

content.body: devsnek: web platform brands are cross-realm

content.body: what’s a “brand” in this context? Never heard the term used as such, and I don’t find it in the ES spec, so I guess it’s coined somewhere else?
